00057 #define SYSTEMC_2_3_3
00058 
00059 #define SYSTEMC_VERSION       20181013
00060 #define SC_VERSION_ORIGINATOR "Accellera"
00061 #define SC_VERSION_MAJOR      2
00062 #define SC_VERSION_MINOR      3
00063 #define SC_VERSION_PATCH      3
00064 #define SC_IS_PRERELEASE      0
00065 
00067 #define IEEE_1666_SYSTEMC     201101L
00068 
00069 #define SC_COPYRIGHT                               \
00070   "Copyright (c) 1996-2018 by all Contributors,\n" \
00071   "ALL RIGHTS RESERVED\n"
00072 
00073 
00074 #define SC_VERSION_RELEASE_DATE \
00075   SC_STRINGIFY_HELPER_( SYSTEMC_VERSION )
00076 
00077 #if ( SC_IS_PRERELEASE == 1 )
00078 #  define SC_VERSION_PRERELEASE "pub_rev"
00079 #  define SC_VERSION \
00080     SC_STRINGIFY_HELPER_( SC_VERSION_MAJOR.SC_VERSION_MINOR.SC_VERSION_PATCH ) \
00081     "_" SC_VERSION_PRERELEASE "_" SC_VERSION_RELEASE_DATE \
00082     "-" SC_VERSION_ORIGINATOR
00083 #else
00084 #  define SC_VERSION_PRERELEASE "" // nothing
00085 #  define SC_VERSION \
00086     SC_STRINGIFY_HELPER_( SC_VERSION_MAJOR.SC_VERSION_MINOR.SC_VERSION_PATCH ) \
00087     "-" SC_VERSION_ORIGINATOR
00088 #endif
00089 
00090 // THIS CLASS AND STATIC INSTANCE BELOW DETECTS BAD REV OBJECTS AT LINK TIME
00091 //
00092 // Each source file which includes this file for the current SystemC version 
00093 // will have a static instance of the class sc_api_version_XXX defined
00094 // in it. That object instance will cause the constructor below
00095 // to be invoked. If the version of the SystemC being linked against
00096 // does not contain the constructor below a linkage error will occur.
00097 //
00098 // The static API check includes the SystemC version numbers as well as
00099 // the underlying C++ standard version (SC_CPLUSPLUS).
00100 
00101 #define SC_API_VERSION_STRING \
00102       SC_CONCAT_UNDERSCORE_( sc_api_version, \
00103       SC_CONCAT_UNDERSCORE_( SC_VERSION_MAJOR, \
00104       SC_CONCAT_UNDERSCORE_( SC_VERSION_MINOR, \
00105       SC_CONCAT_UNDERSCORE_( SC_VERSION_PATCH, \
00106       SC_CONCAT_HELPER_( cxx, SC_CPLUSPLUS ) \
00107   ) ) ) )
00108 
00109 // explicitly avoid macro expansion
00110 #define SC_API_DEFINED_( Symbol ) \
00111   Symbol ## _DEFINED_
00112 #define SC_API_UNDEFINED_( Symbol ) \
00113   Symbol ## _UNDEFINED_
00114 
00115 // Some preprocessor switches need to be consistent between the application
00116 // and the library (e.g. if sizes of classes are affected or other parts of
00117 // the ABI are affected).  (Some of) these are checked here at link-time as
00118 // well, by setting template parameters to sc_api_version_XXX, while only
00119 // one variant is defined in sc_ver.cpp.
00120 
00121 #if 0 // don't enforce check of DEBUG_SYSTEMC for now
00122 // DEBUG_SYSTEMC
00123 #if defined( DEBUG_SYSTEMC )
00124 # define DEBUG_SYSTEMC_CHECK_ \
00125     SC_CONFIG_DEFINED_(DEBUG_SYSTEMC)
00126 #else
00127 # define DEBUG_SYSTEMC_CHECK_ \
00128     SC_CONFIG_UNDEFINED_(DEBUG_SYSTEMC)
00129 #endif
00130 extern const int DEBUG_SYSTEMC_CHECK_;
00131 #endif
00132 
00133 // SC_DISABLE_VIRTUAL_BIND
00134 #if defined( SC_DISABLE_VIRTUAL_BIND )
00135 # define SC_DISABLE_VIRTUAL_BIND_CHECK_ \
00136     SC_API_DEFINED_(SC_DISABLE_VIRTUAL_BIND)
00137 #else
00138 # define SC_DISABLE_VIRTUAL_BIND_CHECK_ \
00139     SC_API_UNDEFINED_(SC_DISABLE_VIRTUAL_BIND)
00140 #endif
00141 extern const int SC_DISABLE_VIRTUAL_BIND_CHECK_;
00142 
00143 // Some preprocessor switches need to be consistent between different
00144 // translation units of an application.  Those can't be easily checked
00145 // during link-time.  Instead, perform a check during run-time by
00146 // passing the value to the constructor of the api_version_check object.
00147 
00148 // Note: Template and constructor parameters are not passed as default
00149 //       values to avoid ODR violations in the check itself.
00150 
00151 template // use pointers for more verbose error messages
00152 <
00153 //  const int * DebugSystemC,
00154   const int * DisableVirtualBind
00155 >
00156 struct SC_API_VERSION_STRING
00157 {
00158   SC_API_VERSION_STRING
00159     (
00160        // SC_DEFAULT_WRITER_POLICY
00161        sc_writer_policy default_writer_policy
00162     );
00163 };
00164 
00165 #if !defined(SC_BUILD)
00166 // import explicitly instantiated template
00167 SC_TPLEXTERN_ template struct SC_API SC_API_VERSION_STRING
00168 <
00169   &SC_DISABLE_VIRTUAL_BIND_CHECK_
00170 >;
00171 
00172 #if !defined(SC_DISABLE_API_VERSION_CHECK)
00173 static
00174 SC_API_VERSION_STRING
00175 <
00176 //  & DEBUG_SYSTEMC_CHECK_,
00177   & SC_DISABLE_VIRTUAL_BIND_CHECK_
00178 >
00179 api_version_check
00180 (
00181   SC_DEFAULT_WRITER_POLICY
00182 );
00183 #endif // SC_DISABLE_API_VERSION_CHECK
00184 #endif // SC_BUILD
00185 
00186 //#undef SC_API_DEFINED_
00187 //#undef SC_API_UNDEFINED_
00188 
00189 } // namespace sc_core
